text: The 1997 British Open Championships was held at the Welsh Institute of Sport with the later stages being held at the Wales National Ice Rink in Cardiff from 31 March - 6 April 1997. Jansher Khan won his sixth consecutive title defeating Peter Nicol in the final. Paul Gregory represented Greece from 1997. ==Draw and results== ==Seeds== ===Main draw=== ==References== Category:Men's British Open Squash Championships Men's British Open Men's British Open Squash Championship Men's British Open Squash Championship Men's British Open Squash Championship Men's British Open Squash Championship Category:1990s in Cardiff Category:Sports competitions in Cardiff
title: 1997 Men's British Open Squash Championship
